paper_abstract: We prove that the maximum degree Delta(n) of a random series-parallel graph with n vertices satisfies Delta(n)/log n -> c in probability, and E Delta(n) similar to c log n for a computable constant c > 0. The same kind of result holds for 2-connected series-parallel graphs, for outerplanar graphs, and for 2-connected outerplanar graphs.
paper_title: The Maximum Degree of Series-Parallel Graphs
